name: Cycle Safe
tagline: A Cyclist Detection and Warning System
body:
### Welcome
The project contains the Python source code for my project building a Cyclist Detection and Warning System that could be retrofitting to existing vehicles using an ultrasound sensor and Raspberry-Pi.

Please see the project page for more information: http://blog.timgrunshaw.com/2013/12/cyclist-detection-and-warning-system.html

### Overview
![Software Design](http://i62.tinypic.com/2gydaq8.jpg)
